bike.description: 6061 aluminum triple butted main tubes with hydro-formed top and down tube, taper gauge “S" bend stays, replaceable derailleur hanger, eyeleted dropouts and seatstay rack mounts

components.description: Full carbon composite with brake mounts, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with single eyelets
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shield puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano RD-2300 SS rear and Shimano FD-R440 bottom pull front
Platform style, steel cage/resin body, toe clip attachable
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
NVO Components TM-3 adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (14-18"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco Elba with Syntex + Kevlar cover and carbon steel rails
Tektro RX-1.0 linear-pull with front power modulator and Shimano levers
